title: Illegal Affairs: Sleeping with the Enemy Trilogy
description: Agent Raelynn Traylor has risked her life and career to uncover the truth about a man many either want dead or in prison. Now she must find a way to prove his innocence to save them both. Her passion for him and justice sets her on a dangerous path. It's her destiny and duty to see this through. In order to fulfill them both she must decide between love and fate. Shane Lafferty has lived his life for others. He doesn't believe in the rules of right and wrong. Until a federal agent leaves him no choice. Now he must choose to cooperate or risk loosing the only passion he's known. Illegal Affair III concludes the short trilogy of dark sensual passion between two unlikely lovers.
author: Sienna Mynx
